column4: anyone knows of some problems compilling kallsyms.c on ubuntu 5.10 with kernel 2.6.12-9-386
not yet I'll give it a try
just the same error, still inconsistent kallsyms data
hmm.. have u applied any third party patches or just compiling the pristine sources
i was following the howto for hibernate2
but nothing in the topic mentions this problem
i believe that this was a known problem in 2.6.13 and appears to be fixed in 2.6.14
already tried but got 13 out of 14 hunks failed when doing patch -p1 < patchfile
against what sources are you applying the patcg

aah.. you'll need to apply the patch first to 2.6.13 and then to 2.6.14. and this needs to be done on the plain linux kernel 2.6.12 from kernel.org, not the ones that are installed with ubuntu as ubuntu would have applied its own set of patches
mmh don't understand it, why patching .13 .14 kernels to get .12 kernel working? Shouldn't I use kernel .14 then?? sorry for the trouble
otherwise disable the extra kallsyms pass in the kernel config
